1/ Let's talk about Quantum Computing vs #bitcoin. First, hashing (like SHA256) is secure against quantum computing:  https://t.co/zIoFhZvqby. This means that current UTXOs (unspent coins) are relatively secure. There's a ~10 minute window of vulnerability when you broadcast.
